answers.answer: It is probably DP  (Dawn Phenomenon)  Your liver dumps sugar in prep for you to get to working.  Metforman helps reduce the liver dump. you may need more Met 750 is a small does (2250) is the max.It can take up to 6 weeks for met to get to full strength, how long have you been on Met?

question: I have Diabetes type 2 and my blood sugar is great during the day. I take Metformin ER 750 my at night. 1pill. My reading prior to dinner is 86 sometimes 109. 2-3 hrs after dinner it may be 115 or lower. Why After Waking Up In The Morning No Snacks My Reading Is Higher Than It Was 2 Hr after eating my dinner?  My morning reading is between 125 to 160.
title: Elevated blood sugar in the morning
